alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington, southeastern Baker and northeastern Malheur Counties through 800 PM MDT/700 PM PDT/... At 720 PM MDT/620 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington, or 15 miles northwest of Weiser, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Henley Basin and Indian Head Mountain around 730 PM MDT. Weiser, McChord Butte and Annex around 750 PM MDT. Mann Creek Reservoir, Mann Creek Guard Station, Midvale Hill and Presley Bridge around 800 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
